languages.text: "Если анафема будет скверно себя вести, данная единица вскроет бронеобшивку, раздробит гидравлические поршни и будет по одному иссекать контактные провода, наблюдая, какие когитационные группы будут отключаться первыми..." {n}Паскаль шепчет угрозы, и чудовищная тварь, втянув пластинчатую шею, отвечат грозным, но не лишенным трепета рыком.{/n}

"If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если анафема будет скверно себя вести, данная единица вскроет бронеобшивку, раздробит гидравлические поршни и будет по одному иссекать контактные провода, наблюдая, какие когитационные группы будут отключаться первыми..." {n}Паскаль шепчет угрозы, и чудовищная тварь, втянув пластинчатую шею, отвечат грозным, но не лишенным трепета рыком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups will shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat uneven growl.{/n}

"If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups will shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat uneven growl.{/n}

"If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

"If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

"If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

languages.text: 「禁忌がわずかでも服従する様子を見せない場合、このユニットは装甲板を開き、液圧ピストンを粉砕し、接触ワイヤーを次々と切断して、どの思考グループが最初に停止するか見届けてやろう」{n}パスカルは脅迫的な言葉を囁く。その怪物の鎧のような体格が縮み、悪意に満ちたいくぶん慎重な唸り声を上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「禁忌がわずかでも服従する様子を見せない場合、このユニットは装甲板を開き、液圧ピストンを粉砕し、接触ワイヤーを次々と切断して、どの思考グループが最初に停止するか見届けてやろう」{n}パスカルは脅迫的な言葉を囁く。その怪物の鎧のような体格が縮み、悪意に満ちたいくぶん慎重な唸り声を上げた。{/n}

languages.text: « Si l'anathème fait preuve de la moindre forme de dissidence, cette unité ouvrira son blindage, pulvérisera ses pistons hydrauliques et commencera à couper ses fils de contact l'un après l'autre pour voir quels groupes de cogitation sont désactivés en premier. » {n}Tandis que Pasqal murmure ses menaces, le monstre blindé se recroqueville sur elle-même en laissant échapper un grognement vicieux, mais néanmoins inquiet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si l'anathème fait preuve de la moindre forme de dissidence, cette unité ouvrira son blindage, pulvérisera ses pistons hydrauliques et commencera à couper ses fils de contact l'un après l'autre pour voir quels groupes de cogitation sont désactivés en premier. » {n}Tandis que Pasqal murmure ses menaces, le monstre blindé se recroqueville sur elle-même en laissant échapper un grognement vicieux, mais néanmoins inquiet.{/n}

languages.text: “只要这台机械表现出任何不服从的征兆，本单位就会拆开它的装甲板，粉碎它的液压活塞，一根根地剪断它的电缆，看看是哪个沉思者组最先宕机。”{n}帕斯卡发出了低声的威胁。这只怪物缩小了形体，发出了充满恶毒但又有些警戒的咆哮声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只要这台机械表现出任何不服从的征兆，本单位就会拆开它的装甲板，粉碎它的液压活塞，一根根地剪断它的电缆，看看是哪个思考器组最先宕机。”{n}帕斯卡发出了低声的威胁。这只怪物缩小了形体，发出了充满恶毒但又有些警戒的咆哮声。{/n}

languages.text: «Si el anatema exhibe la más mínima desobediencia, esta unidad sacará su blindaje, pulverizará sus pistones hidráulicos y empezará a cortar sus cables de contacto uno a uno hasta ver qué grupos de cogitación se apagan primero». {n}Mientras Pasqal susurra sus amenazas, la forma blindada de la alimaña se encoge y deja escapar un rugido despiadado pero receloso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si el anatema exhibe la más mínima desobediencia, esta unidad sacará su blindaje, pulverizará sus pistones hidráulicos y empezará a cortar sus cables de contacto uno a uno hasta ver qué grupos de cogitación se apagan primero». {n}Mientras Pasqal susurra sus amenazas, la forma blindada de la alimaña se encoge y deja escapar un rugido despiadado pero receloso.{/n}

languages.text: "Wenn das Anathema auch nur den geringsten Ungehorsam zeigt, wird diese Einheit ihre Rüstungsplatten öffnen, ihre hydraulischen Kolben pulverisieren und ihre Kontaktdrähte einen nach dem anderen durchtrennen, um zu sehen, welche Cogitationsgruppe sich zuerst abschaltet." {n}Während Pasqal seine Drohungen flüstert, schrumpft die gepanzerte Gestalt des Monsters zusammen und stößt ein wildes, aber auch etwas misstrauisches Knurren aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Anathema auch nur den geringsten Ungehorsam zeigt, wird diese Einheit ihre Rüstungsplatten öffnen, ihre hydraulischen Kolben pulverisieren und ihre Kontaktdrähte einen nach dem anderen durchtrennen, um zu sehen, welche Cogitationsgruppe sich zuerst abschaltet." {n}Während Pasqal seine Drohungen flüstert, schrumpft die gepanzerte Gestalt des Monsters zusammen und stößt ein wildes, aber auch etwas misstrauisches Knurren aus.{/n}

languages.text: "Menfur varlık herhangi bir itaatsizlik belirtisi gösterdiği anda bu birim tarafından zırh plakası açılacak ve hidrolik pistonları ezilecek. Sonra da temas kabloları birbiri ardına kesilirken ilk olarak hangi kavram gruplarının kapandığını gözlemlenecek." {n}Pasqal tehditlerini fısıldayarak sıralarken garabetin plakaları küçülüyor ve yaratık, hasmane olduğu kadar ürkek bir şekilde hırlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If the anathema demonstrates the slightest disobedience, this unit will open its armour plating, pulverise its hydraulic pistons, and start cutting its contact wires one after another to see which cogitation groups shut down first." {n}As Pasqal whispers his threats, the monstrosity's plated form shrinks and lets out a vicious but somewhat wary growl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Menfur varlık herhangi bir itaatsizlik belirtisi gösterdiği anda bu birim tarafından zırh plakası açılacak ve hidrolik pistonları ezilecek. Sonra da temas kabloları birbiri ardına kesilirken ilk olarak hangi kavram gruplarının kapandığını gözlemlenecek." {n}Pasqal tehditlerini fısıldayarak sıralarken garabetin plakaları küçülüyor ve yaratık, hasmane olduğu kadar ürkek bir şekilde hırlıyor.{/n}
